name: Custom Comment Links
author: Sergio Scabuzzo

sections.description:
Ever wish you could remove links inside comments, or their author’s website?

With this simple plugin you can customize how your site’s comment links are shown for author and content.
Enable this plugin and select if:

  • Users with post editing capabilities are affected by the settings.
  • The comment author’s website link is loaded.
  • Any links in the comments are unset or moved next to the link text inside parenthesis.
sections.changelog:
0.2.1

  • Update code to work with PHP 8.1
  • Clean up logic to speed up plugin performance.

0.2

  • Remove setting to disable the comment author website input field on comment forms.
  • Add option to bypass priviledged users, those who can edit posts, from the plugin settings.

0.1.3

  • Fix typo.
  • Fix file structure.

0.1.2

  • Fix options page to be more clear.

0.1.1

  • Added option page so every feature can be enabled/disabled.
  • Added internationalization support.

0.1.0

  • Initial version.

short_description: Customize comment links on your site. Control comment author's URL, remove links from comments. Disable these options for privileged users.
description:

upgrade_notice.0.1.1: Adds plugin settings page where options can be enabled/disabled.
